title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Science Competency Development via Mobile Context-Based Practical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete context-based practical tasks delivered in mobile environments with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can propose ≥3 problem-solving strategies for real-world work environments using feedback from avatar hosts.
Learners can demonstrate ≥70% proficiency in scientific practical skills acquired through mobile learning activities during project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
